TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ParallelHelper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Helpers to work with parallel code in a highly optimized manner.

Docs.typeparam: The type of action (implementing ) to invoke for each iteration index.
Docs.param: The iteration range.

The minimum number of actions to run per individual thread. Set to 1 if all invocations should be parallelized, or to a greater number if each individual invocation is fast enough that it is more efficient to set a lower bound per each running thread.
Docs.summary: Executes a specified action in an optimized parallel loop.
Docs.remarks: None of the bounds of can start from an end.

The minimum number of actions to run per individual thread. Set to 1 if all invocations should be parallelized, or to a greater number if each individual invocation is fast enough that it is more efficient to set a lower bound per each running thread.
Docs.summary: Executes a specified action in an optimized parallel loop over the input data.
